description: This course focuses on the theoretical and practical issues of acquiring a business. Topics include: locating a business, due diligence, reviewing and analyzing data, , valuation, raising capital/financing the deal, structuring the financing the deal, and the actual acquisition process in terms of structuring the acquisition, and integrating the target.
name: ENTREP THROUGH ACQUIS.: Entrepreneurship through Acquisitions

section.name: ENTREP THROUGH ACQUIS.: Entrepreneurship through Acquisitions

values.name: ENTREP THROUGH ACQUIS.: Entrepreneurship through Acquisitions
